Models¶

Model¶

Base class for lightcurve models

class em_pe.models.model.model_base(name, param_names, bands, weight=1)[source]¶

Base “template” class for lightcurve models

Parameters:
  • name (string) – Name of the model
  • param_names (list) – Names of parameters
  • bands (list) – Names of data bands
  • weight (float) – Weight of model used in likelihood calculations
evaluate(t, band)[source]¶

Method to evaluate model at specific time values using the current parameters. Must be implemented by all child classes.

Parameters:
  • t (np.ndarray) – Time values
  • band (string) – Band to evaluate
set_params(params, t_bounds)[source]¶

Method to set the parameters. This would be overridden for more complex models, because this is where the differential equations would be solved.

Parameters:
  • params (dict) – Dictionary mapping parameter names to their values
  • t_bounds (list) – [upper bound, lower bound] pair for time values

Test Models¶

Simple model classes used for testing.

class em_pe.models.test_models.one_band_test_model(weight=1)[source]¶

Simple one-band model for testing

Parameters:weight (float) – Weight of the model
evaluate(t, band)[source]¶

Evaluate model at specific time values using the current parameters.

Parameters:
  • t (np.ndarray) – Time values
  • band (string) – Band to evaluate
class em_pe.models.test_models.two_band_test_model(weight=1)[source]¶

Simple two-band model for testing

Evaluate model at specific time values using the current parameters.

  • t (np.ndarray) – Time values
  • band (string) – Band to evaluate

Gwemlightcurves Models¶

Models adapted from code found in gwemlightcurves

class em_pe.models.gwemlightcurve_models.me2017(weight=1)[source]¶

Implementation of Metzger model

Parameters:weight (float) – Weight of the model
set_params(params, t_bounds)[source]¶

Method to set the parameters and run differential equation for lightcurve model.

Parameters:
  • params (dict) – Dictionary mapping parameter names to their values
  • t_bounds (dict) – Dictionary mapping bands to [upper_bound, lower_bound] pairs for the time values observed in those bands
class em_pe.models.gwemlightcurve_models.woko2017(weight=1)[source]¶

Implementation of lightcurve model found here

Parameters:weight (float) – Weight of the model
set_params(params, t_bounds)[source]¶

Method to set the parameters and run differential equation for lightcurve model.

Parameters:
  • params (dict) – Dictionary mapping parameter names to their values
  • t_bounds (dict) – Dictionary mapping bands to [upper_bound, lower_bound] pairs for the time values observed in those bands

Linear Model¶

Simple model used for tests on actual data.
